start.index: Hi! Tell me today's expenses or any day, and I'll track everything!

message.error_openai: Oops! I can't quite understand! Try starting with [Today I spent...]
message.exception: Oops! I can't perform this action!
message.forbidden: You are not authorized to perform this action!

build_sheet.fail: Error creating the sheet. Check the spreadsheet id in env or the sheet_name in settings
